getBi:function(prodId,coverCode,coverName,varCode,applno){
		var payloadData={};
		if(prodId=="331"){
			payloadData=this.get331(coverCode,coverName,varCode,applno);
		}
		else if(prodId=="345"){
			payloadData=this.get345(coverCode,coverName,varCode,applno);
		}
		if(prodId=="316"){
			payloadData=this.get316(coverCode,coverName,varCode,applno);
		}

		var restMessage = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
restMessage.setHttpMethod("post");
restMessage.setEndpoint("https://balicsit.bajajallianz.com/BalicWSRest/BalicWSRest_UAT4");
restMessage.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
restMessage.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(payloadData));
var response1 = restMessage.execute();
// Get the response body
var responseBody = response1.getBody();

// Print the response body
var link=(((JSON.parse(responseBody).pInObj1_inout).stringval149));
return {"url":link};
	},
